questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'iterator' in STL?
options: To traverse and manipulate elements in a container
questions.correctAnswer: To traverse and manipulate elements in a container

questions.question: Which algorithm is used to reverse elements in a container?
What does 'emplace_back' do in a vector?
options: Adds an element at the end of the vector
Inserts an element at a specific position
questions.correctAnswer: Adds an element at the end of the vector

options: A container that allows access to the highest (or lowest) priority element
questions.correctAnswer: A container that allows access to the highest (or lowest) priority element
